segments.text: Do you want to practice your driving right now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . We can do it right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . Now what do I do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which way do you want me to go ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How far do you want me to go ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll tell you when to stop .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just make sure to tell me beforehand .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We're back now , so why don't you try parking ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , that was fun . Let's do it again soon .
segments.speaker: S2
